clientIndex.description: selected columns index for client dataset

serverIndex.description: selected columns index for server dataset

outputFullFilename.description: path for client save intersection result

sync_result_to_server.description: whether client sync result to server or not. 1: true, 0: false

server_outputFullFilname.description: path for server save intersection result

UniqueValues.description: remove duplicate data from origin data. 1: true, 0: false, if 0 is set, the duplication is guaranteed by user, or maybe task run fail
